类的使用
org.springframework.ui.ExtendedModelMap

  • 使用ExtendedModelMap的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.springframework.ui
    Generic support for UI layer concepts.
    org.springframework.validation.support
    Support classes for handling validation results.
    org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.annotation
    Support package for annotation-based Servlet MVC controllers.

    • org.springframework.ui中ExtendedModelMap的使用

      返回ExtendedModelMap的org.springframework.ui中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      ExtendedModelMap ExtendedModelMap.addAllAttributes(java.util.Collection<?> attributeValues) 
      ExtendedModelMap ExtendedModelMap.addAllAttributes(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,?> attributes) 
      ExtendedModelMap ExtendedModelMap.addAttribute(java.lang.Object attributeValue) 
      ExtendedModelMap ExtendedModelMap.addAttribute(java.lang.String attributeName, java.lang.Object attributeValue) 
      ExtendedModelMap ExtendedModelMap.mergeAttributes(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,?> attributes) 

    • org.springframework.validation.support中ExtendedModelMap的使用

      org.springframework.validation.support中ExtendedModelMap的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  BindingAwareModelMap
      Subclass of ExtendedModelMap that automatically removes a BindingResult object if the corresponding target attribute gets replaced through regular Map operations.

    • org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.annotation中ExtendedModelMap的使用

      参数类型为ExtendedModelMap的org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.annotation中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      ModelAndView ModelAndViewResolver.resolveModelAndView(java.lang.reflect.Method handlerMethod, java.lang.Class<?> handlerType, java.lang.Object returnValue, ExtendedModelMap implicitModel, NativeWebRequest webRequest)
